channel.title: CVE Feed for Byron -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Byron -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-35186|2024-05-23T08:55:20.653Z -- byron -- gitoxide
item.description: gitoxide is a pure Rust implementation of Git. During checkout, `gix-worktree-state` does not verify that paths point to locations in the working tree. A specially crafted repository can, when cloned, place new files anywhere writable by the application. This vulnerability leads to a major loss of confidentiality, integrity, and availability, but creating files outside a working tree without attempting to execute code can directly impact integrity as well. This vulnerability has been patched in version(s) 0.36.0.
